effect_entries.effect:
Held
:   When the holder takes []{type:electric}-type damage from a move, its [Attack]{mechanic:attack} rises by one [stage]{mechanic:stage} and this item is consumed.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Raises the holder's Attack by one stage when it takes Electric-type damage.

flavor_text_entries.text:
使い捨ての　じゅうでんち。
持たせて　でんきの　技を　受けると
攻撃が　あがる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts Attack if hit with an Electric-
type attack. It can only be used once.

Pila monouso. Se il Pokémon che ha questo
strumento subisce un attacco di tipo Elettro,
il suo Attacco aumenta.

Pluma que aumenta un poco los PS de base de
un Pokémon.

Ein einmalig aufladbarer Akku. Erhöht den Angriff
des Trägers, wenn ihn eine Elektro-Attacke trifft.

Une pile jetable.
Tenue, elle augmente l’Attaque lorsque
le Pokémon subit une attaque de type Électrik.

단 한 번 쓰면 없어지는 충전지.
지니게 하고 전기 기술을 받으면
공격이 올라간다.

つかいすての　じゅうでんち。
もたせて　でんきの　わざを　うけると
こうげきが　あがる。

A consumable battery. If the
holder is hit by an Electric-type
move, its Attack will rise.

A consumable battery. If the
holder is hit by an Electric-type
move, its Attack will rise.

Pile jetable. Tenue, elle augmente
l’Attaque lorsque le Pokémon subit
une attaque de type Électrik.
